msg.msgText:
A "RemoteLogServer" composite object can be updated by using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command. The "RemoteLogServer" composite object defines the settings that are used for forwarding MessageSight log messages to a remote syslog server.
SYNTAX: imaserver update RemoteLogServer help imaserver update RemoteLogServer "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update RemoteLogServer "Port=515" "Enabled=True"
Configuration items for "RemoteLogServer" object: Driver The type of the destination for forwarded messages. Options:syslog-tcp,syslog-udp. Host The host name or IP address of the remote syslog server. Port The port number to use when connecting to the remote syslog server. Enabled Whether message forwarding is enabled. Options:True,False.
